contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 1, 1980 Y Welsh Area (Fourth Section)
Welsh Area (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Welsh Area welsh-area-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final) None Wales
Fourth
Due to a dispute with the National organiser, in 1980 the Welsh area was run unofficially, without accreditation to the national contest. The 1979 Welsh section winners were invited to the 1980 finals. An account of events and the dispute is given at http://www.4barsrest.com/articles/2010/1102.asp?l=in#.Wh3ZQVVl-Uk.
Nov. 28, 2017, 11:05 p.m. Nov. 28, 2017, 11:06 p.m.
